Mechanism – known for its mounts and accessories for handheld devices like phones, the Switch 2, Steam Deck, Kindle, and more – has introduced a new Tray Table Mount, available for $19 Prime shipped. It attaches to the seat in front of you with the help of a magnetic grip (see below), freeing up your hands so you can use a controller comfortably or simply relax while watching a movie on your device. This adjustable tray table arm mount is perfect for planes, desks, or anywhere you need a stable hold, and you can learn more about it below.

Regularly $60, this is 25% off the going rate and the lowest price we can find. Considering we are just a couple days away from the 40th anniversary of Super Mario Bros., Nintendo might very well have some surprises up its sleeve for the world’s most famous plumber. We could see a new re-release bundle for Switch 2, something fun for Switch Online, and maybe even a Switch 2 edition of Super Mario Maker 2, but we do not know for sure and until then the current Switch version of Mario Maker is a great way to get your fix of classic 2D Mario action on whatever modern Nintendo console you have, and you can now land a deal on it.

items.title: PayNet CEO Farhan Ahmad To Step Down From Role By Late January 2026
items.summary:
Payments Network Malaysia Sdn Bhd (PayNet) announced today that its Group Chief Executive Officer, Farhan Ahmad, will step down from his role effective 31 January 2026. The company has appointed Praveen Rajan as CEO-Designate, beginning 1 December 2025. Farhan has led PayNet since early 2022, overseeing a period of growth and organisational transformation.
